task.title: Add test suites to a test suite collection

taskbody.context: To add test suites to a test suite collection, do as follows:

step.cmd: In the command toolbar, click Add.
step.stepresult: A Test Suite Browser dialog appears, displaying all of the test suites.

step.cmd: Select the test suites you wish to execute. Click OK.
step.stepresult:
The selected test suites are added to the test suite collection accordingly.
Add test suites to a test suite collection

step.cmd: After adding test suites to the test suite collection, you need to configure the environment for test suite execution. The following table will provide you with the detailed description to set up the environment.

row.entry: To select the environment executed with the Test Suite.

entry.p: This column allows you to specify the configuration for the selected environment. This is mostly applicable to mobile environment.
For example: When you choose iOS environment, you can select which iOS devices you want to execute with by clicking this column.

row.entry: Execution Profile that contains all variables values for each Test Suite execution. To learn more about the execution profile, you can refer to this document: Execution Profile.
To choose the test suite you wish to run in the test suite collection. This is checked by default.
